verses.roman:
eta kahi' siṁha gela, āmāra haila bhaya
ei dekha, nakha-cihna amora hṛdaya

synonyms: eta—thus; kahi'-saying; siṁha—the lion; gela—returned; āmāra—my; haila—there was; bhaya—fear; ei dekha—just see this; nakha-cihna—the nail marks; amora hṛdaya—on my heart.
translation: "After saying this, the lion left, but I was very afraid of Him. Just see the marks of His nails on my heart!"
